Talking about ghost stories  I don't believe in ghosts but I cannot explain my experience
In my single days  my parents house was under renovation by HDB for 3-6 months  can't remember how long
Last time nice.. Now OK.. It's like ma xiaoling show. Last time young see effect nice. Now see some apnn put fireworks during deepavali nicer
As my sister recently got her house after marriage  after discussion we agreed to move in with her until the HDB renovation completed
So I got my own room and that time IRC and StarCraft was the craze with those old dial up modem
The room has an Aircon but I never needed to turn it on because the room was quite cooling despite of the hot weather
I used to play war craft   star craft ðŸ¤£
I had my computer table placed at the end of my single bed so if I'm tired after playing the computer I'll just lie back and rest
Got hantu story. Lai it's story time!!!
A few times when I was playing my computer I could feel something looking from behind my back  I ignored it because I didn't believe in ghosts
I just thought it's my bed calling me
Then one night I was chatting in IRC in one channel and we were talking about ghost stories.
I could feel the feeling of something behind me but I just ignored it as usual. I told my friends and they asked me don't beday you just trying to scare us
I also used to donâ€™t believe in all those superstitious stuff
I told them I could feel my hair on my neck and my arm stand from the left side then slowly to the right side.
They still joking say yah  must be your imagination
I was like wtf  my parents came out of their room asking what happened
I went to reset the circuit breaker of the house then ok again
Getting scolded for using the computer instead of sleeping
Next morning during lunch  my dad was asking me what happened  did you plug in too many things in the room
I told him I didn't even on the Aircon
Wah.. I tot u on your webcam and they ask u why got ah ma behind u
